Ordem final das equacoes: equacao 2, equacao 3, equacao 1


Solucao: 
x 1= 2.40000000000D+0001
x 2=-1.75000000000D+0001
x 3=-1.76470588235D-0001
Solucao: 
x 1= 1.00000000000D+0000
x 2= 2.00000000000D+0000
x 3= 3.00000000000D+0000
